Integration with Talkdesk Appconnect and/or Salesforce allows you to automatically populate your Service profile with information and content from your Service account profiles.
We disclose the personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information that we collect about you as follows: We will use and disclose information where we, in good faith, believe that the law or legal process (such as a court order, search warrant or subpoena) requires us to do so; to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, or violations of our terms and conditions; or in other circumstances where we believe is necessary to protect the rights or property of Company, our users, and third parties.
We will use, store and disclose such information and content in accordance with this Policy.

We also use submitted information and collected information as necessary to provide the features and functionality of the Service to you.
We use the personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information that we collect about you as follows: We may use submitted information and collected information to help troubleshoot problems, provide you with required notices, enforce our User Agreement or to alert you to changes in our policies or agreements that may affect your use of the Service.
We use the personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information that we collect about you as follows: We use submitted information and collected information to personalize the content that you and others see based on personal characteristics or preferences.

text: We use the personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information that we collect about you as follows: We may analyze collected information relating to your use of the Service in order to help us improve the Service and develop and improve other products and services.

We use the personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information that we collect about you as follows:
When you use the Service, we automatically gather certain non-personally identifiable information from you.

Please note that while changes to your account information are reflected promptly in Talkdesk/Salesforce's  databases, our servers may retain previously provided information until we receive such updated information from Talkdesk/Salesforce and have an opportunity to update our active user databases.  You may also be able to view or amend your Service account information directly on our servers through your Service account page.

We also use submitted information and collected information as necessary to provide the features and functionality of the Service to you.
We use the personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information that we collect about you as follows: We may use submitted information and collected information to help troubleshoot problems, provide you with required notices, enforce our User Agreement or to alert you to changes in our policies or agreements that may affect your use of the Service.
We use the personally identifiable and non-personally identifiable information that we collect about you as follows: We use submitted information and collected information to personalize the content that you and others see based on personal characteristics or preferences.
